title: Koukaku Kidoutai Arise: Alternative Architecture
original_name: 攻殻機動隊 ARISE ALTERNATIVE ARCHITECTURE
opening_song: "Anata wo Tamotsu Mono (あなたを保つもの)" by Maaya Sakamoto x Cornelius
ending_song: #1: "Split Spirit" by Yukihiro Takahashi & METAFIVE (Keigo Oyamada × Yoshinori Sunahara × Towa Tei × Tomohiko Kondou × Leo Imai) [高橋幸宏 & METAFIVE (小山田圭吾 × 砂原良徳 ×TOWA TEI× ゴンドウトモヒコ ×LEO 今井)] (eps 1-2)
sinopse:
A TV anime version of Ghost in the Shell: Arise. The first eight episodes are an edited version of the four movies while the last two features a new arc called "Pyrophoric Cult."

The plot involves the "Fire Starter" virus explored previously, and introduces the new character Pyromania. The episode will have ties to the upcoming film.

(Source: Wikipedia)
